scheme_name: Pre-Matric Scholarship for Backward Class Students
details: The scheme aims to provide financial assistance to backward class students studying at the pre-matriculation level in India. Through this scheme, monthly scholarships of varying amounts are provided to eligible students to help them complete their education.
eligibility: The applicant should be a student of classes 6th to 10th.
The parents/guardians of the applicant should not be income taxpayers.
The parents/guardians of the applicant should not own more than 10 acres of land.
application_process: Offline application through Head of the Educational Institution
Fill in the application form, paste the passport-sized photograph, and attach copies of all the mandatory documents.
Submit the duly filled and signed application form along with the documents, within the prescribed period (if any), to the concerned authority.
documents_required: Land Ownership Proof (Showing Less Than 10 Acres of Land)
Application Form in the Prescribed Format
Bonafide Certificate or Proof of Admission in School
Proof of Age or Date of Birth (e.g., Birth Certificate or School Records)
